author: Matt Bassil
description:
There’s a new Disney Villainous set sailing this way! Disney Villainous Treacherous Tides brings two new villains to the series: Tamatoa from Moana and Davy Jones from Pirates of the Caribbean 2.

Continue reading Disney Villainous Treacherous Tides review - A seaworthy release
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best family board games, Best board games for adults, Best Star Wars board games
title: Disney Villainous Treacherous Tides review - A seaworthy release

author: Emma Partlow
description:
The DnD Ranger 5e class is a dexterous martial fighter, as adept with a bow as they are with a finesse weapon in close quarters. These abilities are backed up by nature-based spells and skills that make the Dungeons and Dragons Ranger naturally versatile, able to provide healing, utility, and combat backup to their adventuring allies. This guide explains how the 5e Ranger class works and provides expert tips for playing one.

 

Continue reading DnD Ranger 5e class guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD Ranger 5e class guide

author: Chloe Ward
description:
As a nineties kid, Pokémon was my childhood. In the movie Mewtwo Strikes Back, it wasn't Ash’s tears that brought Pikachu back to life - it was mine! Back then, the Pokémon TCG craze was sweeping the schoolyard, and after they got banned, we kept trading them in secret,  like members of some covert Poké-fight club. Nothing was going to get between us and our Pokémon.

Continue reading Pokémon Journey Together inspired me to give booster packs as wedding favors
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: Pokémon Journey Together inspired me to give booster packs as wedding favors

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Lazotep Sliver has jumped from $2.30 to $18.80 in a number of days, a price spike of 717%. Interestingly, it’s only the regular variant that appeared in the Sliver Swarm deck that’s moved up. Extended art and foil versions that could be found in collector boosters are still pretty cheap.

Continue reading Edge of Eternities creates 700% price spike for MTG Sliver cards
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Edge of Eternities creates 700% price spike for MTG Sliver cards

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Jess Lanzillo, former vice president of franchise and product for Dungeons and Dragons, has announced that she left this role to become creative director at White Wolf. White Wolf is best known for publishing rival TTRPG Vampire The Masquerade, and Lanzillo says it’s “directly responsible for convincing teenage me that games could be serious art”.

Continue reading Another former DnD lead just joined one of its top rivals
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Another former DnD lead just joined one of its top rivals

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Since I started writing full time for Wargamer in 2022, the miniature wargame that has left the biggest impression on me is Star Wars: Shatterpoint - a game that bucks many conventions of wargame design while delivering an incredibly authentic and cinematic Star Wars experience. It doesn’t have anywhere near the profile I think it deserves - but if you want to give it a try, you can get the starter set at a whopping $66 discount right now on Miniature Market.

Continue reading Get my favorite Star Wars miniature wargame, even cheaper than Prime Day deals
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Star Wars Shatterpoint review, The best Star Wars board games, Star Wars Legio
title: Get my favorite Star Wars miniature wargame, even cheaper than Prime Day deals

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Games Workshop has previewed more of the rules for using Titans, towering warmechs with models the size of human infants, in the new edition of Warhammer: The Horus Heresy. The old rules for using these colossal war engines struggled to make them feel appropriately potent, but there are a lot of promising changes that suggest we could be onto something good this time.

Continue reading Warhammer The Horus Heresy's new Titan rules might actually work
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Horus Heresy book order, Warhammer 40k factions, Warhammer 40k primarchs
title: Warhammer The Horus Heresy's new Titan rules might actually work
